column4: Infect, encrypt, ask for payback. As simple as it sounds with our product.
Simple program that keeps replicating till a pc gets slow and a disk gets full. Perfect to annoy your flatmates.
Why would we sell malware without a great way to spread em? Send this to your victim, and he'll open a backdoor for our friends.
Every breath you take, and every move you make. Every bond you break, every step you take, I'll be watching you
Fill programs with ads and enjoy some black hat cash. Don't worry, we also disable the adblock.
